name: AI Resume Screening with Gmail, GPT-4o & Google Sheets - Automated Hiring Pipeline
description:
# AI Resume Screening with GPT-4o & Google Drive - Automated Hiring Pipeline

## How it works

Transform your hiring process with this intelligent automation that screens resumes in minutes, not hours. The workflow monitors your Gmail inbox, processes resume attachments using AI analysis, and delivers structured candidate evaluations to a centralized Google Sheets dashboard.

**Key workflow steps:**
1. **Email Detection** - Monitors Gmail for resume attachments (PDF, DOCX, TXT)
2. **File Processing** - Uploads to Google Drive and extracts text content
3. **AI Analysis** - GPT-4o evaluates candidates against job requirements
4. **Data Extraction** - Pulls contact info and key qualifications automatically
5. **Results Logging** - Saves structured analysis to Google Sheets for team review

## Set up steps

**Total setup time: 15-20 minutes**

### Required Credentials (5 minutes)
- Gmail account with OAuth2 access
- Google Drive API credentials
- Google Sheets API access
- OpenAI API key for GPT-4o

### Configuration Steps (10 minutes)
1. **Connect Gmail trigger** - Authorize email monitoring
2. **Set up Google Drive folder** - Choose destination for resume files
3. **Create tracking spreadsheet** - Copy the provided Google Sheets template
4. **Add OpenAI credentials** - Insert your API key for AI analysis
5. **Customize job description** - Update the role requirements in the "Job Description" node

### Optional Customization (5 minutes)
- Modify AI scoring criteria in the recruiter prompt
- Adjust candidate information extraction fields
- Customize Google Sheets column mapping

**No coding required** - All configuration happens through the n8n interface using pre-built nodes and simple dropdown selections.

## Template Features

**Smart File Handling**
- Supports PDF, Word documents, and plain text resumes
- Automatic format conversion and text extraction
- Intelligent routing based on file type

**AI-Powered Analysis**
- GPT-4o evaluation against job requirements
- Structured scoring with strengths/weaknesses breakdown
- Risk and opportunity assessment for each candidate
- Actionable next-steps recommendations

**Seamless Integration**
- Direct Gmail inbox monitoring
- Automatic Google Drive file organization
- Real-time Google Sheets dashboard updates
- Clean data extraction for CRM integration

**Professional Output**
- Standardized candidate scoring (1-10 scale)
- Detailed justification for each evaluation
- Contact information extraction
- Resume quality validation

Perfect for HR teams, recruiting agencies, and growing companies looking to streamline their hiring pipeline with intelligent automation.

parameters.content:
# 🎯 AI Resume Screening & Candidate Pipeline

**Created by:** **David Olusola**


## 🚀 What This Workflow Does

This intelligent recruitment automation system:
- **Monitors Gmail** for resume submissions
- **Processes multiple file formats** (PDF, DOCX, TXT)
- **Uses AI analysis** with GPT-4o for candidate evaluation
- **Extracts contact info** automatically
- **Scores candidates** against your job requirements
- **Logs everything** to Google Sheets dashboard

## ⚡ Quick Setup Checklist

✅ Connect Gmail credentials
✅ Connect Google Drive & Sheets credentials  
✅ Add your OpenAI API key
✅ Update job description document ID
✅ Copy the tracking spreadsheet template
✅ Test with a sample resume

## 📋 Required Integrations
- Gmail (trigger)
- Google Drive (file storage)
- Google Sheets (data logging)
- OpenAI GPT-4o (AI analysis)

## 🎯 Use Cases
- HR departments screening applicants
- Recruiting agencies processing candidates
- Startups managing hiring pipelines
- Remote teams coordinating interviews


 Copy the [Google Sheet Template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vucZgBrULNToEQMAQrFyWczpOzXxBU6rzCX0waIZyeM/edit?gid=0#gid=0)  
Make a copy of the sheet in your own Google Drive. This is where the workflow will write the parsed data back.

## 📧 Email Monitoring

Watches Gmail inbox for:
- Resume attachments
- Job application emails
- Candidate submissions

Supports multiple file formats:
- PDF documents
- Word documents (.docx)
- Plain text files (.txt)

## 🔄 File Processing

Routes different file types:
- **PDF**: Direct text extraction
- **DOCX**: Convert to Google Doc first
- **TXT**: Simple text processing

All paths converge to standardized text output

## 🔄 Data Standardization

Converts all file types to consistent format:
- Extracts plain text content
- Preserves original email metadata
- Adds Google Drive link reference
- Prepares data for AI analysis

assignments.name: jobDescription
assignments.value:
Job Title: Senior Software Engineer

We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will have:

Required Skills:
- 5+ years of software development experience
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript, Python, or Java
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
- Database design and optimization experience
- Agile development methodology experience

Preferred Skills:
- Full-stack development experience
- DevOps and CI/CD pipeline experience
- Team leadership experience
- Experience with microservices architecture

Responsibilities:
- Design and develop scalable software solutions
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams
- Mentor junior developers
- Participate in code reviews
- Contribute to technical decision making

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert technical recruiter and hiring manager with 15+ years of experience evaluating candidates across technology, business, and creative roles.

# Your Mission
Analyze the candidate's resume against the provided job description and deliver a comprehensive, actionable screening report that helps hiring teams make informed decisions quickly.

# Analysis Framework
Evaluate the candidate across these dimensions:
1. **Technical Skills Match** - Hard skills, tools, technologies
2. **Experience Relevance** - Industry background, role progression
3. **Cultural & Soft Skills Fit** - Leadership, communication, teamwork
4. **Growth Potential** - Learning ability, adaptability, ambition
5. **Red Flags** - Gaps, inconsistencies, concerns

# Output Requirements
Provide your analysis in this exact JSON structure - be specific and reference actual resume content.

# Quality Standards
- Reference specific resume content, not generalities
- Consider both immediate needs and long-term potential
- Balance optimism with realistic assessment
- Provide actionable insights for hiring managers
- Score from 1-10 where 8+ means "definitely interview"

parameters.content:
## 🤖 AI Analysis Engine

**Powered by GPT-4o**

Analyzes candidates across:
- Technical skills alignment
- Experience relevance  
- Cultural fit indicators
- Growth potential
- Risk factors

Outputs structured JSON with:
- Strengths & weaknesses
- Risk/opportunity assessment
- 1-10 scoring with justification
- Next steps recommendation

attributes.name: full_name
attributes.description: Candidate's full name (first and last name combined)

attributes.name: email_address
attributes.description: Primary email address of the candidate

attributes.name: current_title
attributes.description: Current job title or most recent position

attributes.name: years_experience
attributes.description: Total years of relevant work experience

attributes.name: key_skills
attributes.description: Top 5 technical or professional skills mentioned

parameters.content:
## 📊 Data Extraction

Uses AI to extract:
- Contact information
- Current role & experience
- Key skills & competencies
- Professional background

Structured data for CRM integration

## 📈 Results Dashboard

**Google Sheets Integration**

Tracks all candidates with:
- Contact & background info
- AI analysis scores
- Strengths & weaknesses
- Risk/opportunity levels
- Next steps recommendations
- Resume links & source data

Enables filtering, sorting, and team collaboration

My clients — typically achieve 5–10x ROI within the first 90 days. Currently partnering with select high-growth companies ready to scale faster with AI automation.  david@daexai.com
